doc.field: Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Series I. Appeal of Conscience Foundation Material
Subseries I.B. Annual Awards Dinners and Luncheons
Subseries I.B. Annual Awards Dinners and Luncheons

This large subseries contains correspondence, programs, speeches, biographical files, press, guest lists, donor lists, photographs, images, audio cassette tapes, VHS tapes, video recordings, and table seating information pertaining to the annual awards dinner, or AAD, and annual awards luncheon, or AAL, created and produced by the Foundation to honor political and business leaders and to fundraise for the Foundation. The initial name of the award given out by the Foundation was the Man of Conscience award which was changed to the Appeal of Conscience Award. An additional award, the World Statesman award, was added to the awards dinner to honor political leaders. The bulk of the material in this subseries are photographs and images of well-known politicians and business leaders such as Vice President Dick Cheney, Brazilian President Fernando Cardoso, Indian President Kocheril Narayanan, German Chancellor Angela Merkel, and Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chretien. Some of the speeches in this subseries are in Spanish, Italian, and German. There are born-digital media--images and video--in this subseries.
